text: @DineshDSouza At least we took steps (belatedly, thanks to the failed Trump admin.) to mitigate coronavirus fatalities, yet we're still going to have tens of thousands dead. Trump is actually reversing actions meant to slow the impact of climate change. How many will die due to that?
